awards.text: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 4 wins & 5 nominations.

fullplot: The daughter of a brilliant but mentally disturbed mathematician (recently deceased) tries to come to grips with her possible inheritance: his insanity. Complicating matters are one of her father's ex-students who wants to search through his papers and her estranged sister who shows up to help settle his affairs.

title: Proof
